metadata.notes: Cell phone protection and roadside assistance benefit templates

chase-ink.name: Chase Ink Cell Phone Protection
coverageDetails: Covers theft and damage to cell phones
Up to $1,000 per claim, $3,000 per year
Covers you and employees listed on your cell phone bill
requirements: Pay your monthly cell phone bill with your card
File claim within 90 days of incident
Provide copy of cell phone bill showing payment
exclusions: Phones not listed on your wireless bill
Cosmetic damage that doesn't affect function

chase-premium.name: Chase Premium Roadside Assistance
services: Fuel delivery (up to 2 gallons, you pay for fuel)
Winching (if stuck within 100 feet of road)
coverageDetails: Covers any vehicle you're driving or riding in
No limit on number of service calls per year
Service available in US and Canada
limitations: Towing beyond 10 miles at your expense
May have wait times during peak periods

chase-standard.name: Chase Standard Roadside Assistance
coverageDetails: Up to 4 service calls per year
limitations: Towing beyond 5 miles at your expense

amex-premium.name: Amex Premium Roadside Assistance
services: Emergency fuel delivery (up to 5 gallons, fuel cost covered)
coverageDetails: Available 24 hours a day, 365 days a year
Up to 4 service calls per 12-month period
Service available in the US and Canada
No membership fees - included with your card
limitations: Towing beyond 10 miles at cardholder's expense
Wait times may apply during high-demand periods
